post.title: Reflector
post.author: Chris Hynes
post.content: Lutz Roeder's Reflector is one of the most useful tools out there. It's a disassembler that allows you to point at any assembly and break down the code. Scott Hansleman shows off a new PowerShell language plugin for Reflector as well as a nice snapshot of the other addins. It's a great read -- I keep forgetting about all the useful plugins you can add to Reflector.
